description:
Save the galaxy from the horde of alien enemies in this fun spaceship game.

Easy and addictive controls

 Ideal for beginners in the genre

30 Levels with varying difficulty

Earn Diamonds with each completed level

ships to unlock

Manual and Automatic Shooting Option

Music Player to change music whenever you want

Created by DERIK D.F
Port by GRAMIK GAMES STUDIO
name: SHMUP MANIA
intro: Save the galaxy in this fun and exciting Shoot 'em Up game.
